name: Sleepy Driver
description:
A game where you have to stay awake or you lose the control of the car

How to play

  • W - Drive Up / A - Slow Down / S - Drive Down / D - Accelerate
  • Coller Repair Kits and Coffee to Decrese the Damage and the Fatigue
  • After the Fatigue reachs the maximum, you have to do a test to awake

This game was made by johnperes for the GMTK 2020 with the theme "Out of Control".
